name: ButcherBoy
description:
Butcher Boy is a simplistic casual game that is easy to learn, but hard to master.
You play as a son of Butcher that works in the family workshop cutting meat.

GAME FEATURES

- simplistic and easy gameplay
- easy to learn (use WSAD keys to move)
- hard to master, each level gets more difficult
- single player mode
- character customization
- tools customization
